Description.Text: The Sandy Shores Motel is a cozy original Fort Lauderdale property nestled on a private gated courtyard in the very heart of Fort Lauderdale Beach, Florida. Only 300 ft from the beach his secluded oasis offers a 28 foot heated swimming pool surrounded by chaise lounges for sunning, tables with umbrellas, gas grill BBQ area and tropical foliage. We are literally just steps to the Fort Lauderdale Beach and yet maintain our secluded oasis atmosphere. We offer hotel rooms, one bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments perfect for the weekender, vacationer or snowbird.
